kinisi-app.title: Kinisi - AI Exercise Program Generator
kinisi-app.subtitle: AI-powered personalized exercise program generator.
kinisi-app.description: A mobile-responsive web application that builds personalized, adaptive exercise programs using user input from an intake survey and generative AI. It features user authentication, dynamic survey generation, AI-generated assessments, and custom exercise program creation.

metrics.impact: Generates personalized exercise programs to help users build healthy habits.
